Level 5 Abjuration Spell

Touch a creature and negate any Charm, Petrification, Stun, or curse afflicting it.

Greater Restoration is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Greater Restoration is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Abjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Greater Restoration Tips & Notes

Despite saying it can cure "any ability scores or hp reduction", Greater Restoration does not work on permanent ability score reductions from story/dialogue choices. Notes & Tips go here
